channel.title: Octave on IMTI
channel.description: Recent content in Octave on IMTI

item.title: Linear Algebra: Quadratic Form
item.description: This article on quadratic form is part of an ongoing crash course on linear algebra programming, demonstrating concepts and implementations in Python and Octave/Matlab code.

item.title: Linear Algebra: Singular Value Decomposition
